Is the pure spot in the immaculate teacher to whom the thirsty yearns, and racing to prayer where contestants, that place located between the house of the Prophet peace be upon him - the room of Mrs. Aisha may Allah be pleased

Le Meridien Madina is located just 10 minutes’ drive from Al Haram in Medina Munawarrah. It offers rooms and suites with Italian marble furnishings and a free shuttle service to Al Haram. For more details click on below link.

Mawlid or Mawlid al-Nabi al-Sharif (Arabic: مَولِد النَّبِي‎ mawlidu n-nabiyyi, Birth of the Prophet, sometimes simply called in colloquial Arabic مولد mawlid, mevlid, mevlit, mulud among other vernacular pronunciations; sometimes ميلاد mīlād) is the observance of the birthday of the Islamic prophet Muhammad PBUH. For more details click on below link.
